mcq.statement: From following, find the correct punctuated sentence: Shakespeares Hamlet is the play for all ages, Shakespeare Hamelt is the play for all ages

options.a: Shakespeares Hamlet is the play for all ages
options.b: Shakespeare Hamelt is the play for all ages
options.c: Shakespeares' Hamlet is the play for all ages
options.d: Shakespeare's Hamlet is the play for all ages
